name: Key Kid
description:
This is the first puzzle game I've made. Unfortunately there aren't many levels, but I'm not good at level design.

There are probably some bugs with collisions. I was going to avoid this by calculating collisions my self, but calculating collisions for every object colliding with every other object.... was too hard.

I made this in godot, did the art in aseprite, and the font is from Daniel Linssen - itch.io.
